initial_meeting.title: Initial Meeting
initial_meeting.description: In the initial meeting, we discuss what features you need for your website.
content: For example, do you need an interface to add images and text?
We can add tools like analytics or an AI-powered customer service agent if desired.
At this stage, we also assess the project's cost and timeline.

customer_analysis.description: When creating a website, it's important to understand what’s essential from the customer’s perspective.
content: For example, presenting services and information in a specific order.

design.description: If you don't already have a graphic style for the site, we’ll develop it at this stage.
content: We choose the best technologies suited to the project’s needs.
We’ll communicate clearly with you about the graphic style to ensure you’re fully satisfied.

development_and_technologies.description: We primarily build the site using React, Next.js, Astro, and Sanity.
content: We add necessary plugins, such as a calendar booking system, map embedding, and interfaces for adding text and images.

seo.title: Search Engine Optimization
seo.description: We conduct a technical SEO audit for your website.

images_and_media.title: Images and Media
images_and_media.description: We optimize images and media elements to improve load speed.

responsiveness.title: Responsiveness
responsiveness.description: We ensure the site functions well and looks great on various devices.

structure.title: Structure
structure.description: We create a clear site structure and logical URL paths.

meta_data.title: Meta Data
meta_data.description: We add meta titles and descriptions to improve search engine visibility.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We ensure website accessibility with the following measures.
content: Adequate color contrast between text and background
ARIA labels to clarify UI elements
Logical heading structure and semantic HTML tags

testing.description: We ensure the site works well across devices and that all integrations function as they should.
additional_info: We can also make small adjustments as needed before launch.

launch.description: We launch your website once you're satisfied.
additional_info: We ensure everything is set before going live.
Further modifications can be made after launch if needed.

maintenance.description: You can choose a maintenance plan after launch.
content: Maintenance includes server hosting costs and security updates.
